issue.title: [C++] Fix reading LZ4-compressed Parquet files produced by Java Parquet implementation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11301](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11301). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We slightly misunderstood the Hadoop LZ4 format. A compressed buffer can actually contain several "frames", each prefixed with (de)compressed size.

See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9177?focusedCommentId=17267058&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Acomment-tabpanel#comment-17267058
